channel.title: Matter for Ramanathan Kathiresan
channel.itunes:author: Matter
channel.itunes:summary: These are the audio versions of stories saved in your Matter queue.

item.title: Optimal Research
item.description: View in a browser Optimal Research Is it possible that doing too much research can hurt our investment performance? The great thing about investing in the public markets is transaction costs are virtually zero.
item.content:encoded: View in a browser Optimal Research Is it possible that doing too much research can hurt our investment performance? The great thing about investing in the public markets is transaction costs are virtually zero.
item.itunes:author: Matter
item.itunes:summary: View in a browser Optimal Research Is it possible that doing too much research can hurt our investment performance? The great thing about investing in the public markets is transaction costs are virtually zero.

item.title: How I Got Pwned by My Cloud Costs
item.description: One such talk was How I Pwned My Cloud Costs so it seems apt that today, I write about the exact opposite: how my cloud costs pwned me.
item.content:encoded: One such talk was How I Pwned My Cloud Costs so it seems apt that today, I write about the exact opposite: how my cloud costs pwned me.
item.itunes:author: Matter
item.itunes:summary: One such talk was How I Pwned My Cloud Costs so it seems apt that today, I write about the exact opposite: how my cloud costs pwned me.

item.title: Snyk’s shift left approach to API development
item.description: More on the way Snyk is committed to creating a developer-first and API-first platform. By shifting left in our API development SDLC we bring feedback to our developers.
item.content:encoded: More on the way Snyk is committed to creating a developer-first and API-first platform. By shifting left in our API development SDLC we bring feedback to our developers.
